verses.text: \w While|strong="G1722"\w* Apollos \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w passed|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* interior \f + \fr 19:1 \ft Or the highland\f* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*. \w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*

\w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Did|strong="G4100"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w became|strong="G3588"\w* \w believers|strong="G4100"\w*?” “\w No|strong="G3761"\w*,” \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w we|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w even|strong="G3761"\w* heard \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2983"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.”

“\w Into|strong="G1519"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w*, \w then|strong="G3767"\w*, \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G3004"\w* baptized?” \w Paul|strong="G3588"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*. “\w The|strong="G1519"\w* baptism \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*,” \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* explained: “\w John|strong="G2491"\w*’s baptism \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1519"\w* baptism \w of|strong="G2424"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w*. \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w One|strong="G3588"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.”

\w On|strong="G1519"\w* hearing \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* baptized \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w laid|strong="G2007"\w* \w his|strong="G1438"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophesied|strong="G4395"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w about|strong="G5616"\w* \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G3956"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. Paul Ministers in Ephesus (Ephesians 1:1–2; Revelation 2:1–7)

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Paul|strong="G1256"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G3955"\w* \w boldly|strong="G3955"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w months|strong="G3376"\w*, \w arguing|strong="G1256"\w* persuasively \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* stubbornly refused \w to|strong="G2532"\w* believe \w and|strong="G2532"\w* publicly maligned \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Way|strong="G3598"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G1256"\w* \w took|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* left \w the|strong="G1722"\w* synagogue \w to|strong="G2532"\w* conduct \w daily|strong="G2250"\w* discussions \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* lecture hall \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Tyrannus|strong="G5181"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w continued|strong="G1096"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w lived|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* province \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w*,\f + \fr 19:10 \ft Literally in Asia; Asia was a Roman province in what is now western Turkey; similarly in verses 22, 26, 27, and 31.\f* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w alike|strong="G5037"\w*, heard \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w extraordinary|strong="G5177"\w* \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*,

Seven Sons of Sceva

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w itinerant|strong="G4022"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* \w exorcists|strong="G1845"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* tried \w to|strong="G2532"\w* invoke \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*. \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w bind|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G1909"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* proclaims.”

\w Seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w Sceva|strong="G4630"\w*, \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2453"\w* chief priest, \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*.

Eventually, \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, “\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w about|strong="G2424"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w jumped|strong="G2177"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w overpowered|strong="G2480"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G2532"\w*. \w The|strong="G1722"\w* attack \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* violent \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w ran|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w naked|strong="G1131"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wounded|strong="G5135"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Greeks|strong="G1672"\w* \w living|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w held|strong="G3170"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w high|strong="G3956"\w* honor.

\w Many|strong="G4183"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* forward, \w confessing|strong="G1843"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* disclosing \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w deeds|strong="G4234"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w number|strong="G2425"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w practiced|strong="G4238"\w* \w magic|strong="G4021"\w* \w arts|strong="G4021"\w* \w brought|strong="G1161"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* books \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w burned|strong="G2618"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w front|strong="G1799"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w*. \w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w value|strong="G5092"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* books \w was|strong="G3588"\w* calculated, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* total \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w fifty|strong="G3461"\w* \w thousand|strong="G3461"\w* drachmas.\f + \fr 19:19 \ft Or fifty thousand pieces of silver. A drachma was a silver coin worth about one day’s wages.\f*

\w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* powerfully continued \w to|strong="G2532"\w* spread \w and|strong="G2532"\w* prevail. The Riot in Ephesus

\w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w happened|strong="G1096"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w resolved|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \f + \fr 19:21 \ft Or resolved in spirit\f* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w passed|strong="G1330"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Achaia. “\w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*,” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4516"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w well|strong="G2532"\w*.”

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G2532"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G1519"\w* helpers, \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Erastus|strong="G2037"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w while|strong="G5550"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w stayed|strong="G1907"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* province \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w About|strong="G4012"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w arose|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3756"\w* \w disturbance|strong="G5017"\w* \f + \fr 19:23 \ft Literally there arose no little disturbance\f* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Way|strong="G3598"\w*.

\w It|strong="G1063"\w* began \w with|strong="G4160"\w* \w a|strong="G4160"\w* silversmith \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Demetrius|strong="G1216"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* silver \w shrines|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G3686"\w* Artemis, \w bringing|strong="G3930"\w* much \w business|strong="G2039"\w* \f + \fr 19:24 \ft Literally bringing no little business\f* \w to|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w craftsmen|strong="G5079"\w*.

Demetrius assembled \w the|strong="G2532"\w* craftsmen, \w along|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w workmen|strong="G2040"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* related trades. “\w Men|strong="G3778"\w*,” \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w know|strong="G1987"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w business|strong="G2039"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* source \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w prosperity|strong="G2142"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w see|strong="G2334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hear \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w nearly|strong="G4975"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3956"\w* province \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w*, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w great|strong="G3956"\w* \w number|strong="G3793"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w turn|strong="G1510"\w* \w away|strong="G3179"\w*. \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* man-made \w gods|strong="G2316"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w gods|strong="G2316"\w* \w at|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w danger|strong="G2793"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w our|strong="G2532"\w* \w business|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w fall|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* disrepute, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w goddess|strong="G2299"\w* Artemis \w will|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* discredited \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G1519"\w* \w majesty|strong="G3168"\w* deposed—\w she|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* worshiped \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* province \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w world|strong="G3625"\w*.”

\w When|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w enraged|strong="G4134"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G1096"\w* \w shouting|strong="G2896"\w*, “\w Great|strong="G3173"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* Artemis \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Ephesians|strong="G2180"\w*!”

Soon \w the|strong="G2532"\w* whole \w city|strong="G4172"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* disarray. \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w rushed|strong="G3729"\w* \w together|strong="G3661"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w theatre|strong="G2302"\w*, \w dragging|strong="G4884"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w Gaius|strong="G1050"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Aristarchus, \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*’s \w traveling|strong="G4898"\w* \w companions|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3110"\w*.

\w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w wanted|strong="G1014"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w go|strong="G1525"\w* \w before|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w assembly|strong="G1218"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w would|strong="G1014"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w allow|strong="G1439"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.
